item.title: Ben Whishaw delivers layered performance as Brutus
item.author: Zie Yang,
item.description: There was a time we killed the King/ We tried to change the world too fast/ Now we have got another King/ He is no better than the last.” – I found this play resonated rather neatly (or should I say vice versa) with the lyrics from Les Misérables ’ musical film in 2012. In this modern-dress …
